data.text:
It was the week after Rhein Kraft had won the 『Fillies' Review』. 
This time, it was Cesario's turn to run the 『Flower C』.
data.processed:
<story>It was the week after Rhein Kraft had won the 『Fillies' Review』. 
<story>This time, it was Cesario's turn to run the 『Flower C』.

data.text:
(This is her first attempt at a major and she 
was overwhelmingly the favorite……I was worried 
the pressure might be a little much for her, but――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(This is her first attempt at a major and she 
<story>was overwhelmingly the favorite……I was worried 
<story>the pressure might be a little much for her, but――)

data.text: Fuu――!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Fuu――!!

data.text:
And it's Cesario! Cesario pulls out in front! 
A lead of 2 lengths, now 3 lengths! Cesario is out front!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And it's Cesario! Cesario pulls out in front! 
<story>A lead of 2 lengths, now 3 lengths! Cesario is out front!!

data.text:
――Goal!! First place is Cesario!! On the last straight, 
she showed us the difference in strength!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>――Goal!! First place is Cesario!! On the last straight, 
<story>she showed us the difference in strength!!

data.text:
Uwaah~! Seriously!? Isn't that a record time too!? 
Amazing~~……!!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Uwaah~! Seriously!? Isn't that a record time too!? 
<story>Amazing~~……!!

data.text:
Hold on……this is……just too incredible. 
Cesario-san……that girl, just how far will she――
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Hold on……this is……just too incredible. 
<story>Cesario-san……that girl, just how far will she――

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
(How far……? Just how far will Cesario go……? 
Just how much……will I have to do――!?)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(How far……? Just how far will Cesario go……? 
<story>Just how much……will I have to do――!?)

data.text:
――And now you're watching a special VTR…… 
for the 『Oka Sho』, as expected, aren't Rhein 
Kraft and Cesario the focus of attention!?
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>――And now you're watching a special VTR…… 
<story>for the 『Oka Sho』, as expected, aren't Rhein 
<story>Kraft and Cesario the focus of attention!?

data.text:
That's true. Within the Tiara rotation, 
the abilities of those two are a cut above, without a doubt.
data.name: Commentator A
data.processed:
<story>That's true. Within the Tiara rotation, 
<story>the abilities of those two are a cut above, without a doubt.

data.text:
Will it be Rhein Kraft's powerful leader strength, 
or Cesario's sharp closing leg! We can expect a 
heated first time showdown at the 『Oka Sho』.
data.name: Commentator B
data.processed:
<story>Will it be Rhein Kraft's powerful leader strength, 
<story>or Cesario's sharp closing leg! We can expect a 
<story>heated first time showdown at the 『Oka Sho』.

data.text:
And then there's something that both of them have in common! 
They are both members of the same team, <Ascella>, and so――!
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>And then there's something that both of them have in common! 
<story>They are both members of the same team, <Ascella>, and so――!

data.text:
Today, we have <Ascella>'s trainer here with us! 
Trainer-san, for the upcoming 『Oka Sho』 what 
kind of advice have you given them!?
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>Today, we have <Ascella>'s trainer here with us! 
<story>Trainer-san, for the upcoming 『Oka Sho』 what 
<story>kind of advice have you given them!?

data.text:
I was already at a loss for words. It was obviously 
because I was both Rhein Kraft's and Cesario's trainer.
data.processed:
<story>I was already at a loss for words. It was obviously 
<story>because I was both Rhein Kraft's and Cesario's trainer.

data.text:
Creating a training menu geared towards victory at the 『Oka Sho』. 
This was an important duty as their trainer. However――
data.processed:
<story>Creating a training menu geared towards victory at the 『Oka Sho』. 
<story>This was an important duty as their trainer. However――

data.text:
For Rhein Kraft, the main point of her menu would 
end up being 『Countermeasures against Cesario』.
data.processed:
<story>For Rhein Kraft, the main point of her menu would 
<story>end up being 『Countermeasures against Cesario』.

data.text:
Similarly, for Cesario, it would end up 
being 『Countermeasures against Rhein Kraft』.
data.processed:
<story>Similarly, for Cesario, it would end up 
<story>being 『Countermeasures against Rhein Kraft』.

data.text:
……Of course, I instructed to the best of my ability. 
For both Rhein Kraft and Cesario.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Of course, I instructed to the best of my ability. 
<story>For both Rhein Kraft and Cesario.

data.text:
I'd be glad if either of them won, but…… 
I also want both of them to win. Which is why 
I intended to provide equal guidance to both.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'd be glad if either of them won, but…… 
<story>I also want both of them to win. Which is why 
<story>I intended to provide equal guidance to both.

data.text: ――that's how I ended up answering……
data.processed: <story>――that's how I ended up answering……

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa, haa…… 
……Haa……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa, haa…… 
<story>……Haa……!!

data.text:
Haa……no!! Like this, I'll still get overtaken……! 
Cesario will……catch me……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haa……no!! Like this, I'll still get overtaken……! 
<story>Cesario will……catch me……!

data.text:
The 『Oka Sho』 is so soon…… 
What should I do……? Like this, I'll……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>The 『Oka Sho』 is so soon…… 
<story>What should I do……? Like this, I'll……!

data.text: At that time. Rhein Kraft looked so desperate that I――
data.processed: <story>At that time. Rhein Kraft looked so desperate that I――

data.text:
Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking 
away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you 
need to be conscious of using the best of your abilities.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking 
<story>away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you 
<story>need to be conscious of using the best of your abilities.

data.text:
Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking 
away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you 
need to be conscious of using the best of your abilities.

data.processed:
<story>Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking 
<story>away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you

data.text: Trainer-san……but, that's……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san……but, that's……!

data.text:
Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… 
you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… 
<story>you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.

data.text:
Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… 
you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… 
<story>you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.

data.text: These members……? Um, what do you mean?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>These members……? Um, what do you mean?

data.text:
……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. 
Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. 
<story>Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.

data.text:
……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. 
Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. 
<story>Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.

data.text:
You're strong at maintaining a high pace……the advantage 
of 『Maintaining Pace』. If you pull ahead early, you'll 
definitely be able to hold on until the end.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: You'll be fine. I believe in you
You'll be fine. I believe in you

data.processed:

<story>definitely be able to hold on until the end.

data.text:
My strength…… 
……Okay. I understand! Thank you very much!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>My strength…… 
<story>……Okay. I understand! Thank you very much!!

data.text:
(For the Oka Sho……based on the members, there's a high 
probability of everyone jostling for position. It wasn't 
a good idea to be stuck in the crowd for too long.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(For the Oka Sho……based on the members, there's a high 
<story>probability of everyone jostling for position. It wasn't 
<story>a good idea to be stuck in the crowd for too long.)

data.text:
(So……it would be more advantageous for Kraft 
to pull ahead earlier. ……that much was true.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(So……it would be more advantageous for Kraft 
<story>to pull ahead earlier. ……that much was true.)

data.text:
(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get 
surrounded since she'd be running more towards the back?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get 
<story>surrounded since she'd be running more towards the back?)

(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get 
surrounded since she'd be running more towards the back?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get

data.text:
(It might be unnecessary. Whether or not it would be a problem 
depends on how the race develops. Since she has overwhelming 
strength, it might be better to focus on her own running)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(It might be unnecessary. Whether or not it would be a problem 
<story>depends on how the race develops. Since she has overwhelming 
<story>strength, it might be better to focus on her own running)

data.text:
(Don't get distracted by your surroundings, 
concentrate on maintaining form and focus only 
on your own running. That would be best for Cesario――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Don't get distracted by your surroundings, 
<story>concentrate on maintaining form and focus only 
<story>on your own running. That would be best for Cesario――)

data.text: I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……

data.text: I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……

data.text:
(With 1600m, Kraft might have a chance. But, the next race, Oaks……
at 2400m, honestly, it would probably be difficult……)
data.name: <username>

choices.text: No, I can't! As a trainer――

data.processed:
<story>(With 1600m, Kraft might have a chance. But, the next race, Oaks……

data.text: (Bzzzz-! Bzzzz-!)
data.processed: <story>(Bzzzz-! Bzzzz-!)

data.text:
That scared me……a LANE from Rhein Kraft? 
Not in the Team <Ascella> group chat, but a DM……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That scared me……a LANE from Rhein Kraft? 
<story>Not in the Team <Ascella> group chat, but a DM……?

data.text:
『Trainer-san, good evening! I'm sorry for the sudden 
contact, but I want to ask you for a favor』
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>『Trainer-san, good evening! I'm sorry for the sudden 
<story>contact, but I want to ask you for a favor』

data.text:
『Saturday, tomorrow at 11AM, can you come with 
me to the riverbed for independent training?』
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>『Saturday, tomorrow at 11AM, can you come with 
<story>me to the riverbed for independent training?』

data.text:
I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want 
to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want 
<story>to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?

data.text:
I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want 
to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want 
<story>to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?

data.text:
『Trainer, I'd like some advice regarding extra training. 
Saturday, at 11AM, can you accompany me to the riverbed?』
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>『Trainer, I'd like some advice regarding extra training. 
<story>Saturday, at 11AM, can you accompany me to the riverbed?』

data.text: 『I want to run more this weekend, no matter what!』
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>『I want to run more this weekend, no matter what!』

data.text: 『I cannot afford to lose the Oka Sho』
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>『I cannot afford to lose the Oka Sho』

data.text: Trainer-san! Let's do some individual training!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san! Let's do some individual training!

data.text: Trainer, let's do some individual training.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Trainer, let's do some individual training.

data.text: Please!
data.name: Kraft&Cesario
data.processed: <story>Please!

data.text: Trainer(-san)!!
data.name: Kraft&Cesario
data.processed: <story>Trainer(-san)!!

data.text:
……wait, huh!? 
That voice……came from outside!?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……wait, huh!? 
<story>That voice……came from outside!?

data.text:
Sorry for coming in uninvited. 
……Trainer, you look pale? Are you okay?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Sorry for coming in uninvited. 
<story>……Trainer, you look pale? Are you okay?

data.text:
Fuu……Fufufuu, Ahahahaha! 
It's fine now right, Cesario……!? One-two!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Fuu……Fufufuu, Ahahahaha! 
<story>It's fine now right, Cesario……!? One-two!

data.text: Prank successful~!
data.name: Kraft&Cesario
data.processed: <story>Prank successful~!

data.text:
Seems like we caused you quite a bit of trouble, huh? 
Sorry, Trainer. The earlier LANE messages were a 
joke that Kraft and I thought up.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Seems like we caused you quite a bit of trouble, huh? 
<story>Sorry, Trainer. The earlier LANE messages were a 
<story>joke that Kraft and I thought up.

data.text:
Lately, Trainer-san, it looks like you've always 
been deep in thought……earlier today when I was training, 
it almost seemed like your eyes were spinning.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Lately, Trainer-san, it looks like you've always 
<story>been deep in thought……earlier today when I was training, 
<story>it almost seemed like your eyes were spinning.

data.text:
But, that's why, even if it was a bit forceful, we wanted to 
tell you. ……Trainer-san, we both understand your feelings.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>But, that's why, even if it was a bit forceful, we wanted to 
<story>tell you. ……Trainer-san, we both understand your feelings.

data.text:
You've put a lot of thought and heart in to it, haven't you? 
You've been trying to keep the training even between Kraft and me.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>You've put a lot of thought and heart in to it, haven't you? 
<story>You've been trying to keep the training even between Kraft and me.

data.text:
Isn't that something unbelievable!? To ensure that either 
one of us wins, and since we're both on the same team, to 
be able to give both of us equal guidance on how to win.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Isn't that something unbelievable!? To ensure that either 
<story>one of us wins, and since we're both on the same team, to 
<story>be able to give both of us equal guidance on how to win.

data.text:
It must have been hard to bear…… 
Thank you very much.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>It must have been hard to bear…… 
<story>Thank you very much.

data.text:
Trainer. For now, can you just believe in us……? 
Until the 『Oka Sho』 can you leave the training to us?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Trainer. For now, can you just believe in us……? 
<story>Until the 『Oka Sho』 can you leave the training to us?

data.text:
Of course, if we're really troubled we'll ask 
for help though! However, how should I say it…… 
for now, we just want you to watch over us.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Of course, if we're really troubled we'll ask 
<story>for help though! However, how should I say it…… 
<story>for now, we just want you to watch over us.

data.text:
We'll train with all our strength, and we'll win. 
At the 『Oka Sho』――for sure!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>We'll train with all our strength, and we'll win. 
<story>At the 『Oka Sho』――for sure!

data.text: ――Ahh, damnit!!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>――Ahh, damnit!!

data.text: ――Ahh, geez!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>――Ahh, geez!

data.text: Eh, eh!? T-Trainer-san!?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Eh, eh!? T-Trainer-san!?

data.text:
Oh……! Your cheeks are turning bright red! 
We should get some ice!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Oh……! Your cheeks are turning bright red! 
<story>We should get some ice!

data.text:
It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide 
it and had to have you two do that for me……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide 
<story>it and had to have you two do that for me……

data.text:
It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide 
it and had to have you two do that for me……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide 
<story>it and had to have you two do that for me……

data.text:
……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. 
I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. 
<story>I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?

data.text:
……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. 
I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. 
<story>I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?

data.text:
Trainer-san……! Fufuu. 
……As I thought, you really are someone that won't give up!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san……! Fufuu. 
<story>……As I thought, you really are someone that won't give up!

data.text: Yes, please do. ……I look forward to working with you, Trainer.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Yes, please do. ……I look forward to working with you, Trainer.

data.text:
They both gave me a clear response. 
I was greatly encouraged by their growth……
data.processed:
<story>They both gave me a clear response. 
<story>I was greatly encouraged by their growth……
